Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: patch torchao/PyTorch compatibility and update run_training.sh

Adds monkey-patch for missing torch.int1-int7 dtypes that torchao 0.15.0
expects but PyTorch 2.5.x doesn''t have. Updates run_training.sh to use
the new train.py script with pre-formatted dataset.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: remove unsloth.triton_cache reference and Triton cache clearing

The TRITON_CACHE_MANAGER env var pointed to unsloth.triton_cache which
doesn''t exist in unsloth 2026.1.4, causing ModuleNotFoundError when
Triton tried to compile kernels.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
